TopicTitle: Speak like a Brit Mk II

Articles.Content:
What what, I say its Jolly good that we have a new thread to be British in.

Post things with British accents

Original thread here:http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/10181-To-speak-in-a-fashion-similar-to-an-upper-class-person-of-british-origin

Edited May 27, 2013 by DarthVader
I say, what a jolly good idea old bean. Now we can have our tea and crumpets together.
why i say ,i can finally jolly reside with a spot of amusing accents while stupendously obeying to a rather jolly stereotype
Well I say! This is possibly the most marvelous thread in existence! *sips tea* We'll be having a jolly good time indeed!
But don't you know old bean, that stereotypes derived from a few subjects then generalizing the whole group as them? I say.

*kicks down door*

Oi! where can a man git himself a glass o' ale around here?! I been lookin' all ovah the bloody place for one, i mean really!
Oh, I say, its a hooligan!
Run for your jollywell lives i shall have to bring out my sherlock homes walking stick fighting manual oh i shall have a marvellous time
I do say the weather is spiffing today, Tally ho old chum.
Oh indeed my good chapette.
I take it your rockets are bolloxing up as we speak
But of course old chum!
I say! Top 'O the mornin' to you all!
'ello chaps, 'ow ya doin'?
Oi there! If ya ain't gonna give me an ale, den Buggah off mate!
I am jolly well displeased at these hooligans!
*alter ego* Quite! This scum should very well be removed from our society. Filthy buggers they are.
I say, weren't you that hooligan fellow?
What? No sir! what a ridiculous assumption! I am lord blackwood III, only the highest of the high.

*Bursts into flames*

Oh dear me! I seem to have Spontaneously combusted!
It would appear I have died! If you're reading this, then I'm going to haunt you, you bugger!

*Bursts into flames*

Oh dear me! I seem to have Spontaneously combusted!

I must douse the flames with a good old cup of tea!
Old bean, would you like smidge more of tea?
What about those glorious scones you make, Leon? I could do jolly well with one of those!
Indeed Rage my old chum. Would you like just a dollop of thick Devon cream on that?
